verses.content: Pharaoin Gaza a rûn hmaa, Philistin mihai chungthua zâwlnei Jeremia kuoma LALPA thu hung tlung chu.

LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta u, hmârtienga inthawkin tuihai a hung lien a, vadung kuong lêt hung nîng a ta, ram le a sûnga umhai le khawpui le a sûnga umhai le chun hung lêtkhum a ta; mihai chu khêk an ta, ram hluotuhai po po ṭap inrûm an tih.
A mi hrâthai ketin tet rîka le, a sakawr tawlailîrhai tlân rîka le, taw- lailîr kehai innâwt rîka chun pahai chu an ṭi a, an nauhai enkai theilo lêkin an kuthai a zawi thla a;

ṭhangpuitu la um taphawthai chu Tura le Zidona inthawka sât thlâk dingin, Philistin mihai po po suksietna dinga ni hung tlung chu a ni leiin, Kaphtor thlierkâra la um- sunhai, Philistin mihai chu LALPA chun a sukbohmang ding a ni sih a.
Gazaa chun châtvaina a hung tlung a, an phairuom la um sun, Askelon hlak chu ieng khawm loa siem a ni tah a; chun, nang le nang ieng chen am în ât ding a na?
Aw nang LALPA kâwlhnâm, i châwl ṭawk ṭawk hma po chu ieng chen am nîng a ta? nang chu i bâwma chun inthun nâwk el rawh, châwl la, um ṭawk ṭawk rawh.
LALPA chun thaw ding a pêk si che chun iengtin am châwl thei i ta? Askelon le tuisuoriet panga umhai thaw dingin a ruot che a nih.
